channel.title: Because Math Is Boring
channel.description:
Since this is the graphics section, I figured I'd post an IRL graphic. This is what happens when you mix AP Geometry and boredom:
[img]http://img514.imageshack.us/img514/8396/mthzi9.jpg[/img]
No bad for 30 minutes of quick drawing xD. I have to fix up the area around the thumb, eg. the shading and fingernails, and add some stress lines on the thumb.

really nice job.
alot of the people in my honors classes draw the whole time, too.

item.title: Because Math Is Boring

item.description:
@goatee wrote:

It looks nice, but for some reason it doesn’t look like a realistic hand. The shape i mean ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Because Math Is Boring
item.dc:creator: @Dregen Dregen
item.description:
@Dregen wrote:

Kickass dude, I give it 9/10.

Something I think that could be done with the thumb is make it look like it’s bent just below the joint. What I mean is, the bottom of the thumb just makes the thumb look like it isn’t bent, just curved. Like, add lines right below the joint so it looks like the thumb is bending at the joint, and not curved.

I can’t explain things well, so if you don’t get what I mean maybe someone can “translate” me lol.

I couldn’t do that in 30 minutes though… And I can’t shade for shit either, my class acts like I’m so good at drawing, but I bet if I posted the drawings on MITB, they wouldn’t get even a 5/10.

Read full topic

item.title: Because Math Is Boring
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Hmm… The scar doesn’t really fit, and that line just below the thumb(half circle thing) should be a bit lighter. The way you drew it makes it look like the thumb isn’t even attached.

Read full topic
